choices.D: It is incapable of filesystem runtime defense.
choices.B: It is deployed as a service.
choices.A: It is implemented as runtime protection in the userspace.
choices.C: It is deployed as a container.

questions.question_text: Which two statements apply to the Defender type Container Defender - Linux?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
A --> It is implemented as runtime protection in the userspace.
C --> Docker must be installed on the host because this Defender type runs as a container.

https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/22-06/prisma-cloud-compute-edition-admin/runtime_defense/runtime_defense_containers

discussion.content:

A

Cloud Provisioning Admin (Defender Manager)
DevOps team members that need to manage Defender deployments without sysadmin privileges.
